title: [SOLVED]820-2915 No Wifi
message:
Hello.  I have 820-2915 with no wifi (no hardware). I have already tested with known working card.  Here are pin measurements from connector. L3404 is working and has been replaced just in case. Thank you. Have a good one.


pn 22 - 3.3V
pn 24 - 3.3V
pn 26 - 3.3V
pn 27 - 3.3V
pn 28 - 3.3V
pn 29 - 3.3V
pn 30 - 3.3V

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 No Wifi
message: Usually missing a coil in the data lines, L3401, L3470/1/2/3/4

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 No Wifi
message: Replaced L3401. All set. Thanks Duke.
